properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Akaikinao, ry Tompo tia,
Ho tena akaikinao,
No faniriako ka avia,
Hatony aho izao.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Akaikinao no mahatam√†na,
Ny tena akaikinao,
Fa eo dia lavitra Satana
Satria resinao.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Akaikinao no misy hery,
Dia eo akaikinao ;
Hizorana andalan-tery
Mankany aminao.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Akaikinao no fahoriana,
Raha tena akaikinao,
Dia mody re ho fifaliana
Sy fitahiana izao.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Akaikinao no hahitana,
Eny, eo akaikinao,
Ny tavanao 'zay fahazavana
Sy tokiko izao.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Akaikinao tsy ho ela intsony
Ho tena akaikinao,
Rehefa tonga any ambony
Eo antrehanao.
